casebody.data:
Lori Gray, Derivatively On Behalf Of First National Community Bancorp, Inc.
v.
Louis A. Denaples, Michael J. Cestone, Jr., Joseph Coccia, Dominick L. Denaples, Joseph J. Gintile, John P. Moses, William P. Conaboy, Michael Conahan, J. David Lombardi, Demetrious & Company, LLC., First National Community Bancorp, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation; Faruqi and Faruqi v. Joseph R. Solfanelli; Petition of Joseph R. Solfanelli NO. 91 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania June 22, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.
